definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Eight-year old Akram plays marbles with his friends in south of Kabul, capital of Afghanistan, in Nov. 2010.
sentences.chinese: 月，在阿富汗首都喀布爾，阿克拉姆與朋友們玩兒球。

sentences.english: An Afghan worker cuts firewood to light a brick kiln in Kabul.
sentences.chinese: 在喀布爾，一阿富汗工人削木柴，以點燃磚窯。
莫里斯從喀布爾發回報道稱。

sentences.english: He dreams of the teaching job at Kabul University and of marrying a woman back home. She is the daughter of family friends a Sayed Shiite who traces her lineage to the prophet Muhammad.
sentences.chinese: 他夢想着在喀布爾大學任教，然後回老家娶媳婦。

sentences.english: She will attend the Kabul conference aimed at shoring up the Afghan government of President Hamid Karzai.
sentences.chinese: 她將參加旨在鞏固阿富汗卡爾扎伊政府的喀布爾會議。

sentences.english: Women walk at the Sakhi cemetery in Kabul on March 16.
sentences.chinese: 婦女走在喀布爾的薩基在3月16日公墓。

sentences.english: We drove on, down from the high mountains of eastern Afghanistan towards Kabul.
sentences.chinese: 從阿富汗東部的高山上下來，我們驅車前往喀布爾。

sentences.english: Afghan farmers harvest wheat outside Kabul, Afghanistan, Thursday, June 24, 2010. (AP Photo/Dusan Vranic)
sentences.chinese: 6月24日，阿富汗農民在喀布爾外收割小麥。

sentences.english: Ms. Salik has other projects in mind for the Kabul Women’s Garden.
sentences.chinese: 對於喀布爾女性花園，賽麗柯女士還有其他的打算。

sentences.english: Akram playing with his friends in southern Kabul, Afghanistan, in Nov. 2010.
sentences.chinese: 月，在阿富汗首都喀布爾，阿克拉姆與朋友們玩耍。

sentences.english: Afghan women walk through the Panjshir Valley, north of Kabul.
sentences.chinese: 兩名走過潘傑希爾峽谷的婦女，喀布爾南部。

sentences.english: The industry in Kabul is far more dog-eat-dog.
sentences.chinese: 而喀布爾的安保行業則是種黑喫黑的局面。

sentences.english: Security has deteriorated in the capital and many parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 在首都喀布爾和阿富汗許多地方，安全局勢有所惡化。

sentences.english: She urged Kabul to stop making such claims.
sentences.chinese: 揚尤亞敦促喀布爾不要再提出這種指稱。

sentences.english: A girl played next to her mother's artificial leg at the ICRC Ali Abad Orthopaedic Centre in Kabul, Afghanistan, Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 一名小女孩在她目前的母親旁玩耍，喀布爾，阿富汗。

sentences.english: In Kabul, the Afghan capital, the streets are quieter than usual.
sentences.chinese: 在喀布爾，阿富汗的首都，街道比平日裏寧靜。

pinyin: Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3
Wu1 zi1 bie2 ke4 si1 tan3
